feedback: Image 1 is missing the dialog content present in Image 2.
Image 1 lacks the buttons ('Cancel' and 'Confirm') present in Image 2.
Image 1 does not have a close icon ('X') that is present in Image 2.
Typography difference: Image 1 title font-size appears smaller than Image 2.
Color difference: Image 2 has a background color (#FFFFFF) with a shadow, while Image 1 is plain white without shadow.
Button color difference: Image 2 has a 'Confirm' button with a blue background (#6366F1), which is absent in Image 1.
Spacing difference: Image 2 has padding around the content, while Image 1 does not.
Add dialog content text below the title in Image 1.
Include 'Cancel' and 'Confirm' buttons in Image 1.
Add a close icon ('X') to Image 1.
Increase the font-size of the title in Image 1 to match Image 2.
Add a shadow to the dialog box in Image 1 to match Image 2.
Implement button styles in Image 1, particularly the blue 'Confirm' button.
Add padding around the dialog content in Image 1.
Title text: Image 1 has 'Dialog Title', Image 2 has 'Confirm Action'.
Subtitle text: Image 1 is missing a subtitle, Image 2 has 'Are you sure you want to proceed with this action?'.
Buttons: Image 1 has no buttons, Image 2 has 'Cancel' and 'Confirm' buttons.
Close icon: Image 1 has no close icon, Image 2 has a close icon (X) in the top right corner.
Background color: Image 1 has a plain white background, Image 2 has a slightly elevated card with shadow.
Button colors: Image 2 has a purple 'Confirm' button (#6366F1) and a white 'Cancel' button with a border.
Add subtitle text below the title in Image 1.
Include 'Cancel' and 'Confirm' buttons in Image 1.
Add a close icon (X) in the top right corner of Image 1.
Implement a card-like background with shadow for Image 1.
Ensure button colors match: 'Confirm' button should be #6366F1.
